statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -3 \\ 1 \\ 2 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 7 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ 4 \\ -10 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -11 \\ 22 \\ -11 \\ -17 \\ 25 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 17 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ -6 \\ -20 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
